title: The Obvious Book: Common sense, not as common as you might think.
description: How can doing what you’re told get you into so much trouble?Due to over-confidence, all the drains along the street are ripped out, PJs are worn to school and someone becomes stuck in a locker but, despite their confidence, they fail to prevent the great school theft. The Obvious Book contains eight funny, sequential stories linked in a similar way to Andy Griffith’s Just Tricking!Boy, 10 years old: “I loved it. I especially liked in the first one how the person got stuck.”Girl, 10 years old: “It was really funny!”Buy now at www.lucindaireland.com Or Amazonhttp://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_sb_nos...
author: Lucinda Ireland
